2. Terms And conditions

a: Payment terms : 10% along with the order, 30% before painting, 30% before delivery, 30% after delivery
b: Warranty Period: : Not Applicable
c: Penalty : The vendor will be subjected to a penalty if the product / service is not delivered within the proposed time. 10 % per week will be deducted from the total amount or if the amount has already been paid then the vendor is liable to pay 10 % of the amount. The amount is to be transferred by the vendor within 60 (Sixty) days . Accepted date before which the product to be delivered: 1 Week from the date of Purchase order
d: Insurance: : Not Applicable
e: Confidentiality Agreement : The vendor is to abide by the confidentiality agreement of Agnikul Cosmos Private Limited at all times, if it has executed any.
f: Liability : Agnikul Cosmos Private Limited shall be entitled to recover the entire amount or cancel the purchase order in case the vendor fails to deliver the product as mentioned in the quotation.
g: Documents to be Submitted : All pertaining documents related to the product, payment and delivery are to be provided by the vendor.
h: Delivery Terms : Vendor will preserve, pack, package and handle the deliverables and products so as to protect the deliverables and products from loss or damage and in accordance with best commercial practices in the absence of any specifications, Agnikul may provide so
